ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I really wanted one   =P Hmmm, I am 99% sure that my one doesn t have +10 magic, I ll check tonight and then post a reply tomorrow. Lonnie Lewis
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I really wanted one =P
Hmmm, I am 99% sure that my one doesn't have +10 magic, I'll check tonight
and then post a reply tomorrow.




Lonnie Lewis <llewis@...> on 11/04/2000 15:16:51

Please respond to eqbards@egroups.com

To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....




1600 pp?? for a runed bone fork??

and yes, it's +10 MR also.

Bien

p.s. 1600pp??

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John_Senior@... [SMTP:John_Senior@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 12:11 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
>
>
>
> >>Ranged: Runed Bone Fork (dam 5, delay 29, +10 vs fire, +10 vs cold, +10
> vs
> >>magic)
>
> Whats all this talk of +10 vs magic?? I have runed bone fork and I'm sure
> it is only +10 vs fire/cold resists. Is it just me being senile or do I
> have a dodgy item here (was purchased from a member of FoH). The damn
> thing
> cos me 1600pp so I hope I didn't get a faulty item =P
>
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 44 songs <Guardians of Light>
> Veeshan Server
>
>
>
>
